alert.note: Alert for Gentry; Harrison (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued May 06 at 6:26PM CDT until May 06 at 11:00PM CDT by NWS Kansas City
info.description: ...A TORNADO WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 645 PM CDT FOR EAST CENTRAL GENTRY AND SOUTHWESTERN HARRISON COUNTIES... At 626 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located near Albany, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Tornado and ping pong ball size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. Locations impacted include... Albany and New Hampton. TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN
info.instruction: TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
